import React, { useState } from 'react' import { RiCloseCircleLine } from 'react-icons/ri' import { TiEdit } from 'react-icons/ti' import TodoFrom from './TodoForm' import TodoList from './TodoList' function Todo({todos, completeTodo, remove }) { const [edit, setEdit] = useState({ id: null, value: '' }) return todos.map((todo, index) => (
completeTodo(todo)}> {todo.text}
)) } export default Todo
